subject: Technology
title: Twitter and the 140-Character Limit
description: A quick, practical guide to Twitter and the 140-Character Limit.

hook.text: In 2006, Jack Dorsey pitched a platform for short status updates, like texts broadcast to the world.

buildup.text: The original idea was called 'twttr.' Messages were limited to 140 characters to fit a single SMS.

discovery.text: That brutal limit forced people to be concise. It accidentally created a new form of public writing.

twist.text: Twitter became vital during real crises. The 2009 Iranian protests spread globally through tweets.

climax.text: World leaders and journalists made Twitter the default public square of the internet era.

punchline.text: A text message limit created a global conversation.

quiz.question: Why were tweets originally limited to 140 characters?
options: To fit within one SMS text message
